'''Ladep''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Daily Commission]] ''[[The Great Tree: Rooted State]]''.

==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Ladep is a [[Sumeru Akademiya]] student from the [[Spantamad]] Darshan. Despite belonging to separate Darshans, they collaborate with [[Amurta]] student [[Yasmin]] and [[Kshahrewar]] student [[Pharez]] to study the health of [[Sumeru City]]'s [[Divine Tree]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Great Tree: Rooted State}}</ref>
